dc_title_s: The Peninsula of India: from the Krishnah River to Cape Comorin, drawn chiefly from materials in the collection of Alexander Dalrymple, Esq.
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: The Peninsula of India : from the Krishnah River to Cape Comorin\, drawn chiefly from materials in the collection of Alexander Dalrymple\, Esq.
dc_description_s: Scale [1:1,100,880] (E 74⁰--E 81⁰30ʹ/N 13⁰--N 8⁰). Relief shown pictorially. "The map engraved by J. Phillips & W. Harrison : the writing also by W. Harrison." "An account of the construction of this map will be found in the Memoir of the Map of Hindoostan (1788) sections I, IV, and V." Size estimated based on sheet 2 only. 59 x 88 cm
b1g_keyword_sm: India, South Maps Early Works to 1800
